channel.title: Comments for page "Giant Cockroach"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Giant Cockroach"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: It could be a reference in general to insect or arachnid monsters/armor in anime. Thus, it could be a reference to Kamen Rider (super powers of a cricket/grasshopper) becoming so prevalent it's like cockroaches in major cities. Or giant insects attacking in cities, but it's as common as the bugs themselves is a serious point to em.

item.title: Reference
item.content:encoded: It won't let me edit the article for some reason. I was going to say it's probably a reference to the old novelty song, "The Cockroach that Ate Cincinnati", which is about just that. It's by Rose & the Arrangement, and was a standby on the Dr. Demento Show.
